product_name: Tenda TX9 Pro AX3000 Dual-band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router

description.title: Tenda TX9 Pro AX3000 Dual-band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router
description.details: The Tenda TX9 Pro comes with a 1.6GHz high-performance Dual-core processor and the operating capacity can reach up to 3000 DMIPS, and NPU processing speeds up to 2220 MHZ. It provides 160MHz bandwidth and 1024-QAM for ultra-fast wireless connection. With a total networking speed of 2976Mbps. It is loaded with OFDMA + MU-MIMO, 802.11ax technology provides greater network capacity and efficiency in congested environments than Wi-Fi 5. The Tenda TX9 Pro comes with 4x 6dBi external antennas for wider Wi-Fi coverage. Both 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands use two external high-performance signal enhancement FEM modules to enhance signal strength. It supports BSS coloring technology and effectively alleviates co-frequency interference. The Tenda TX9 Pro is IPv6 Supported and can shorten the data transmission time between Internet devices and servers. The Tenda TX9 Pro comes with a 1-year warranty.

price_info.details: The latest price of Tenda TX9 Pro AX3000 Dual-band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router in Bangladesh is 6,150৳. You can buy the Tenda TX9 Pro AX3000 Dual-band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router at best price from our website or visit any of our showrooms.

reviews.review_comment: Impressive router with fast speeds and wide coverage.
Great Wi-Fi router for gaming and streaming.

product_name: TP-Link Archer AX53 AX3000 Dual Band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router

description.title: TP-Link Archer AX53 AX3000 Dual Band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router
description.details: The TP-Link Archer AX53 AX3000 Router includes a Dual Band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router. It has 802.11ax/n/b/g Wi-Fi technology that provides simultaneous 2.4GHz 574Mbps and 5GHz 2402Mbps connections, making it suitable for speedier downloading, online gaming, Internet calling, and HD video streaming. It is compatible with all 802.11ax/n/b/g devices. The TP-Link Archer AX53 Dual Band Router contains four fixed high-performance antennas. The Dual Band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router provides a wider range over a longer distance. This gives you wireless independence with great signal and coverage in any large home or workplace. The Wi-Fi 6 Router includes Ethernet ports for connecting the primary DSL modem, wired computers, wired printers, and other network devices at ultra-fast wired speeds that are ten times faster than traditional Fast Ethernet connections. The TP-Link Archer AX53 Router offers Client modes, allowing it to provide a variety of wireless solutions. You can choose a suitable wireless mode to construct or extend your wireless network based on your present network topology. There are also WPS, Power On/Off, LED On/Off, and Reset buttons. It provides a simple wireless security setup with the press of a WPS button. The Quick setup, includes a built-in bilingual management page, making it simple to manage. Intelligent bandwidth control manages each computer's bandwidth utilization in a reasonable manner. Fast Ethernet ports offer a fast connection. The TP-Link Archer AX53 AX3000 Dual Band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router comes with 1 Year Warranty.

product_name: Microsoft Windows 11 Professional 64 Bit ENG Intl 1PK DSP OEI DVD

features.Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster with 2 or more cores

Requirements.Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster with 2 or more cores on a compatible 64-bit processor or System on a Chip (SoC)
Others: Graphics card: DirectX 12 compatible graphics / WDDM 2.x

description.title: Microsoft Windows 11 Professional 64 Bit ENG Intl 1PK DSP OEI DVD
description.details: The Windows 11 Pro is here! It comes with many incredibly useful features. It is built on the consistent and compatible Windows 10 foundation. Windows 11 is designed for powerful security and a great user experience across a wide range of devices and configurations. Windows 11 can be managed with your familiar tools and processes. Improve your focus with a simpler, more intuitive experience and effortless navigation. Get things done with fewer steps using the refreshed Start, Taskbar, and Navigation Center. You can snap the apps you need into a group and seamlessly return to it even when you open another app or dock and undock your monitor. You can create a custom desktop for each project and switch instantly between them from your taskbar. You can also type with your voice that instantly turns your ideas into text. Window 11 offers smarter collaboration with Teams. You can mute and unmute your mic directly from your taskbar without having to find and click on your meetings app and instantly share any app or window directly from your taskbar in online meetings. The next evolution of Windows is here.
